sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "media" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"title" text,
	"artist" json NOT NULL,
	"type" text NOT NULL,
	"album" json NOT NULL,
	"cover" json NOT NULL,
	"stream" json NOT NULL,
	"duration" integer NOT NULL,
	"playCount" integer NOT NULL,
	"genre" text,
	"track" integer,
	"year" integer
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "queue" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"trackIds" json NOT NULL,
	"randomTrackIds" json NOT NULL,
	"currentPlaying" text,
	"repeat" boolean,
	"shuffle" boolean,
	"nextSongId" text,
	"prevSongId" text
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "settings" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"settings" json NOT NULL
);
ALTER TABLE "media" ALTER COLUMN "duration" SET DATA TYPE real;
ALTER TABLE "media" ALTER COLUMN "cover" DROP NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "media" DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS "genre";

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "smart_playlist" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"name" text NOT NULL,
	"filters" json NOT NULL,
	"createdAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updatedAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL
);
ALTER TABLE "media" ADD COLUMN "createdAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "media" ADD COLUMN "updatedAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "queue" ADD COLUMN "createdAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "queue" ADD COLUMN "updatedAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "settings" ADD COLUMN "createdAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "settings" ADD COLUMN "updatedAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "playlist" ADD COLUMN "createdAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "playlist" ADD COLUMN "updatedAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL;
